content:
# The insertion of 5 units of iron ore into the Stone Furnace was successful. 
# The furnace is currently working and has 4 units of iron ore left to smelt, along with 4 units of coal remaining as fuel. 
# It has produced 5 iron plates so far.

# Now, I will wait for the smelting process to complete again. 
# I will check the inventory periodically to see when the iron plates are ready.

# Let's wait for a maximum of 30 seconds to check if the Iron Plates are produced successfully.
for _ in range(30):
    sleep(1)  # Wait for 1 second
    inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)
    if inventory.get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 5:  # Check if at least 5 iron plates are produced
        print(f"Inventory after smelting: {inventory}")
        break
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # Raise an error if smelting takes too long.
